code: import React from'react';import{Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginProtector=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const userType=localStorage.getItem('userType');if(userType==='customer'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/",replace:true});}if(userType==='admin'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/admin",replace:true});}if(userType==='operator'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/operator",replace:true});}return children;};export default LoginProtector;
